name: Maze Escape (itch)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #31 in 48h, the theme was: Entire Game on One Screen.

Just play the game for the intended effect :)

Controls:

  • Arrows + Space
  • M: Toggle sound on/off
  • R: Restart game

Game url: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=33074
